author: BOL
title: Papa Francisco pede 'fidelidade Ã  democracia' - NotÃ­cias - BOL
text:
Papa Francisco pede 'fidelidade Ã  democracia' 01/06/2024 11h16
VATICANO, 1 JUN (ANSA) - Em uma audiÃªncia neste sÃ¡bado (1Âº) com 6 mil representantes das AssociaÃ§Ãµes CristÃ£s de Trabalhadores Italianos (ACLI) por ocasiÃ£o do 80Â° aniversÃ¡rio de fundaÃ§Ã£o, o papa Francisco pediu "fidelidade Ã  democracia".
"Hoje precisamos muito dela. Uma sociedade democrÃ¡tica Ã© aquela em que realmente hÃ¡ lugar para todos, na realidade dos fatos e nÃ£o apenas em declaraÃ§Ãµes e no papel", disse Francisco.
"Ã‰ importante o Ã¡rduo trabalho que vocÃªs fazem, especialmente para apoiar aqueles que correm o risco de serem marginalizados: os jovens, para os quais sÃ£o destinadas iniciativas de formaÃ§Ã£o profissional; as mulheres, que frequentemente continuam a sofrer formas de discriminaÃ§Ã£o e desigualdade." "Os trabalhadores mais vulnerÃ¡veis e os migrantes, que encontram alguÃ©m capaz de ajudÃ¡-los a obter o respeito de seus direitos; e finalmente os idosos e aposentados, que com muita facilidade sÃ£o 'descartados' pela sociedade. E isso Ã© uma injustiÃ§a", elencou o pontÃ­fice.
"A estas pessoas vocÃªs prestam um serviÃ§o importante, que nÃ£o deve apenas se limitar Ã  assistÃªncia, mas promover a dignidade de cada pessoa e a possibilidade de que cada um possa colocar em campo seus recursos e sua contribuiÃ§Ã£o", concluiu Francisco. (ANSA).
Veja mais notÃ­cias, fotos e vÃ­deos em www.ansabrasil.com.br .

author: Mark Masuch
title: Kardiologe warnt: Bei Medikamenten ist in der Hitze besondere Vorsicht geboten
text:
Gefahr bei hohen Temperaturen
Kardiologe warnt: Bei Medikamenten ist in der Hitze besondere Vorsicht geboten
NÃ¶rdlingen / Lesedauer: 3 min
Doch die hohen Temperaturen locken die Menschen nicht nur ins Freibad oder an den See, sie bergen vor allem zahlreiche gesundheitliche Risiken, wie Ãœberhitzung und Kreislaufprobleme. Laut Professor Bernhard Kuch sind insbesondere Menschen gefÃ¤hrdet, die bestimmte Medikamente einnehmen.
Wir sehen, dass bei Hitzeperioden viel mehr Menschen in unser Krankenhaus kommen. Und uns fÃ¤llt seit Langem auf, dass diese Personen hÃ¤ufig bestimmte Medikamente einnehmen.
Professor Bernhard Kuch
Laut dem Chef-Kardiologen des Stiftungskrankenhauses NÃ¶rdlingen drohen Herzinfarkte und SchlaganfÃ¤lle. Zum Thema Nebenwirkungen von Medikamenten in sommerlichen Hitzeperioden ist Kuch jÃ¼ngst vom deutschen Fachmagazin â€žSpektrum der Wissenschaft â€“ Gehirn & Geistâ€œ als Experte befragt worden. Was der Mediziner betroffenen Patienten empfiehlt.
â€žWir sehen, dass bei Hitzeperioden viel mehr Menschen in unser Krankenhaus kommen. Und uns fÃ¤llt seit Langem auf, dass diese Personen hÃ¤ufig bestimmte Medikamente einnehmenâ€œ, erklÃ¤rt Kuch, der auch Ã¤rztlicher Direktor der NÃ¶rdlinger Donau-Ries-Klinik ist.
Fest stehe nach wissenschaftlichen Untersuchungen, dass die Zahl der Herzinfarkte bei Hitzerekorden ansteigen wÃ¼rde, erlÃ¤utert der Mediziner. Aber auch der Einfluss von Arzneien werde sichtbar: Menschen, die Betablocker zur Senkung des Blutdrucks oder verschiedene Medikamente wie Aspirin oder Clopidogrel einnehmen, hÃ¤tten laut â€žSpektrum der Wissenschaftâ€œ bei heiÃŸem Wetter ein Ã¼berdurchschnittlich hohes Risiko fÃ¼r einen Herzinfarkt.
Steigende KÃ¶rpertemperatur wird nicht bemerkt
Dazu sagt Kuch: â€žBetablocker verhindern, dass die GefÃ¤ÃŸe auf Temperaturwechsel angemessen reagieren. Deshalb steigt die KÃ¶rpertemperatur an, ohne dass die Menschen es merken. Das macht sie empfindlicher fÃ¼r Herzinfarkte.â€œ
Die anspruchsvolle Anpassung des KÃ¶rpers an Hitze kÃ¶nne zudem auch durch EntwÃ¤sserungstabletten gestÃ¶rt werden, die sowohl Patienten mit HerzschwÃ¤che als auch solche mit Bluthochdruck bekommen kÃ¶nnten. Sobald das Thermometer steige, wÃ¼rden diese Menschen beginnen, zu schwitzen und darÃ¼ber hinaus mehr Wasser als Ã¼blich verlieren. â€žBlutdrucksenkende oder entwÃ¤ssernde PrÃ¤parate kÃ¶nnen bei Hitze gefÃ¤hrliche Nebenwirkungen entfaltenâ€œ, bringt es Professor Kuch auf den Punkt.
Nimmt man Medikamente ein, sollte man an heiÃŸen Tagen also ganz besonders darauf achten, genÃ¼gend zu trinken.
Professor Bernhard Kuch
Der Chef-Kardiologe warnt: â€žWenn Medikamente bei Hitze das Herz aus dem Takt geraten lassen, kann das fatale Folgen haben. Menschen stÃ¼rzen dann Ã¶fter oder Organe werden nicht richtig versorgt. Auch ein Schlaganfall oder Herzinfarkt kann sich dann leichter ereignen.â€œ
Deshalb rÃ¤t Professor Kuch, dass sich Patienten, die sehr viele Medikamente einnehmen, in Hitzeperioden mit ihrem behandelnden Arzt absprechen sollten, welche Medikamente sie besser pausieren oder in niedriger Dosis einnehmen sollten.
Generell sei eine ausreichende Zufuhr von FlÃ¼ssigkeit essenziell, wenn Medikamente optimal wirken sollen. â€žFlÃ¼ssigkeit ermÃ¶glicht die Aufnahme von Arzneimitteln im Magen-Darm-Trakt, ihre gleichmÃ¤ÃŸige Verteilung im KÃ¶rper und den Transport zu den Zielorten. Kurz gesagt: Wasser optimiert die Wirkung von Medikamenten und minimiert Nebeneffekteâ€œ, erlÃ¤utert der Ã¤rztliche Direktor.
Kuchs Tipp bei besonders hohen Temperaturen: â€žNimmt man Medikamente ein, sollte man an heiÃŸen Tagen also ganz besonders darauf achten, genÃ¼gend zu trinkenâ€œ, rÃ¤t er.
-

author: CNN Newsource
title: SoCal beaches face ongoing high surf warnings as massive waves threaten the coast
text:
SoCal beaches face ongoing high surf warnings as massive waves threaten the coast
By AMY MAETZOLD
Click here for updates on this story
SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA (
KCAL) â€” Southern California anticipates large waves throughout the weekend, increasing flood risk and posing dangers for beach communities.
The entire coastline in Ventura County, including beaches, harbors, and piers, will be closed on Friday due to high surf and flooding concerns. The closures are listed below:
Ventura Pier All Ventura Beaches City of Oxnard All City of Oxnard public beaches City of Port Hueneme Port Hueneme Pier Faria Beach Hobson Beach Rincon Parkway RV Area Kiddy Beach Silverstrand Beach Hollywood by the Sea California State Parks Ventura State Beach McGrath State Beach Mandalay State Beach San Buenaventura State Beach Emma Wood Campground Harbors Channel Islands Harbor Entry Ventura Harbor Entry A high surf warning was issued for Ventura and Los Angeles Counties and will remain in effect until 10 p.m. on Saturday. Waves ranging from 8 to 13 feet are expected, with the possibility of isolated sets reaching up to 20 feet.
The NWS warns of extremely hazardous beach conditions, emphasizing the risk of drowning and damage to coastal structures like piers and jetties.
Forecasters highlight west-facing beaches such as Hermosa, Manhattan, and Palos Verdes will be the areas with the highest surf.
A coastal flooding advisory will remain in effect for Los Angeles County beaches, including the Malibu coast and Catalina Island, until 10 p.m. on Saturday. Residents in the area should expect flooding in low-lying areas, including parking lots, beaches and walkways during high tide.
In Orange County, a high surf warning and coastal flood advisory will remain in effect until 2 a.m. Monday. Forecasters predict waves of 6 to 12 feet, with sets of up to 15 feet in northern Orange County.
Please note: This content carries a strict local market embargo. If you share the same market as the contributor of this article, you may not use it on any platform.

author: Anna Seebauer
title: "TatsÃ¤chlich... Liebe"-Star Joanna Bacon stirbt an Krebs
text:
"TatsÃ¤chlich... Liebe"-Star Joanna Bacon stirbt an Krebs
Joanna Bacon, die britische Schauspielerin, bekannt aus "TatsÃ¤chlich... Liebe" und beliebten TV-Serien wie "EastEnders", ist am 14. Juni nach einem kurzen Kampf gegen den Krebs verstorben. Sie wurde 72 Jahre alt. Die Nachricht von ihrem Tod wurde von der Harlow Theatre Company bekannt gegeben, mit der Joanna seit ihrer GrÃ¼ndung im Jahr 1978 eng verbunden war. Ihr BegrÃ¤bnis fand am 15. Juli statt. "Viele unserer Mitglieder werden sich an Jo und ihre Energie, ihren Witz und ihre Leidenschaft erinnern", hieÃŸ es in einer Mitteilung des Theaters.
Neben ihrer ikonischen Rolle als Mutter von Martine McCutcheons Charakter Natalie in der romantischen KomÃ¶die "TatsÃ¤chlich... Liebe" war Joanna auch in zahlreichen britischen Fernsehserien zu sehen. Dazu gehÃ¶ren Produktionen wie "Prime Suspect", "A Touch of Frost" und "Little Britain". Zudem Ã¼berzeugte sie mit Rollen in TheaterstÃ¼cken wie "The Merchant of Venice" und "Abigailâ€™s Party". Des Weiteren trat die Britin regelmÃ¤ÃŸig in namhaften Theatern wie dem National Theatre und dem Sheffield Crucible auf. Zuletzt war sie in der Serie "Breeders" und in "Moonflower Murders" neben Lesley Manville (69) zu sehen.
Ihre Leidenschaft fÃ¼r die BÃ¼hne zeigte sich auch abseits des Rampenlichts. Selbst nachdem sie nicht mehr aktiv spielte, blieb sie der Harlow Theatre Company treu, besuchte AuffÃ¼hrungen und saÃŸ gerne in der ersten Reihe, um kritische Notizen zu machen. "Sie hat nie vergessen, unsere Arbeit zu loben", wÃ¼rdigte die Theatergesellschaft sie. Joanna Bacon hinterlÃ¤sst eine LÃ¼cke in der britischen Schauspielszene und wird von ihren Kollegen und Fans als leidenschaftliche und talentierte KÃ¼nstlerin in Erinnerung bleiben. "Ruhe in Frieden, Darling", verabschiedete sich das Harlow Theatre in seiner Mitteilung.

author: MoisÃ©s Valderas
title: Caza Estelar y Destrucci\u00f3n volver\u00e1n en detrimento del modo Duelos
text:
Caza Estelar y DestrucciÃ³n volverÃ¡n en detrimento del modo Duelos
-
Ya anunciaron que Duelos pasarÃ­a a un segundo plano, pero permanente
-
Iban a rotar junto a Noqueo, pero es ligeramente mÃ¡s popular que duelos
-
[Un nuevo brawler gratis para la Brawlidad 2024](https://www.eldesmarque.com/videojuegos/20241118/nuevo-brawler-gratis-confirmado-navidad-2024-brawl-stars_300505857.html#utm_source=sumario&utm_medium=articulo)
Durante esta semana, Brawl Stars prepara ya los ajustes finales de su nueva temporada. Lo mÃ¡s importante estÃ¡ listo, como [la llegada del nuevo brawler, Shade](https://www.eldesmarque.com/videojuegos/20241028/asi-son-juju-y-shade-los-nuevos-brawlers-de-la-brawl-talk-de-octubre_300485667.html), pero los retoques hacÃ­a falta rematarlos. Y en esa materia, su manager general y lÃ­der de desarrollo se encontraba muy activo en redes sociales, especialmente en el terreno de la nueva rotaciÃ³n de modos de juego, en la que [finalmente Duelos pasarÃ¡ a un segundo plano](https://www.eldesmarque.com/videojuegos/20241121/modo-duelos-podria-dejar-ser-permanente-brawl-stars_300508222.html), para abrirle la puerta a DestrucciÃ³n y Caza Estelar.
El modo Duelos sigue siendo un Ã©xito desde que lo convirtieron en modo permanente, pero aÃºn asÃ­ les despertaba algunas dudas. Funciona, pues es sÃ³lido y bastante popular, pero quizÃ¡ un puntito por debajo de lo esperado. Es por ello que se mantiene en la rotaciÃ³n permanente, pero ahora debe compartir espacio con dos viejos amigos. A falta de saber si finalmente [el modo Coleccionista de Almas puede tener hueco cuando termine la temporada](https://www.eldesmarque.com/videojuegos/20241120/coleccionista-almas-podria-quedarse-nuevo-modo-brawl-stars_300507192.html) de Ãngeles contra Demonios.
Una reflexiÃ³n a tres partes. En primer lugar, buscar mejoras en lo que respecta al modo Duelos, y saber cÃ³mo darle menos protagonismo, pero manteniÃ©ndolo casi todo el tiempo. En segundo lugar, darle espacio a Caza Estelar y DestrucciÃ³n, muy demandados por la comunidad. Y tercero, hacer encajar todas las piezas, cuando a priori iba a ser Noqueo el damnificado por ambos regresos.
Update
We've decided to handle this a bit differently! We will rotate Wipeout and Bounty with Duels. Knockout is significantly more popular than Duels, and while usually we like to keep similar modes together in a slot, this just feels like the better solution.
Thanks forâ€¦
â€” Frankâ„¢ KEIENBURG ðŸ³ï¸ðŸŒˆ (@FTMKeienburg)
[November 21, 2024]
La nueva rotaciÃ³n de Duelos con Caza Estelar y DestrucciÃ³n en Brawl Stars
Finalmente y como actualiza el propio Frank Keienburg, manager general de Brawl Stars, dado que Noqueo es ligeramente mÃ¡s popular que Duelos, su slot sigue como permamente, mientras que el otro lo deberÃ¡n compartir a tres bandas. Â¿CÃ³mo? Pues el plan original, cuando iba a ser Noqueo el sacrificado, era que el modo actual estuviese el 50% y el resto se dividiesen. De mantener la misma idea, nos encontrarÃ­amos en el Ãºltimo slot de modos de juego, algo similar a esto:
- DÃ­a 1: Duelos
- DÃ­a 2: Caza Estelar
- DÃ­a 3: Duelos
- DÃ­a 4: DestrucciÃ³n
- DÃ­a 5: Duelos
- DÃ­a 6: Caza Estelar
- DÃ­a 7: Duelos
- DÃ­a 8: DestrucciÃ³n
- DÃ­a 9: Duelos
- [...]
De este modo, el equipo de Supercell puede medir la popularidad real de estos dos modos tan demandados. Y dado que apenas tendrÃ¡n hueco a lo largo de 9 dÃ­as durante la temporada, cada uno, va a haber que aprovecharlos. Lo que puede inflar las cifras y que de cara a la temporada de enero, se mantenga tal cual, o que incluso haya una rotaciÃ³n mÃ¡s equitativa cada tres dÃ­as.
Por el momento toca celebrar estos dos regresos, pues los jugadores mÃ¡s veteranos de Brawl Stars no entienden el juego sin su Caza Estelar. Un modo que sÃ­ encontramos en otras parcelas del juego, y que ha estado con nosotros desde siempre. Mientras que la adrenalina que genera DestrucciÃ³n, siempre es mÃ¡s que bienvenida.

author: Lisa Lee
title: ShelterLogic Dog Shade Canopy Review 2024: Keeping Lorelei Cool in the California Heat
text:
Click to Skip Ahead
About ShelterLogic?
Overview
Key Features
Is It A Good Value?
FAQ
Our Experience
Our Final Verdict We give the ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy a rating of 4.8 out of 5 stars.
Quality: 5/5 Ease Of Use: 4.8/5 Material: 5/5 Durability: 4.8/5 Value: 5/5 Check Price on ShelterLogic
I live in Southern California, and during the summer monthsâ€¦ it gets hot. Actually, it tends to be pretty toasty throughout the year. My entire front and back yard are artificial grass because my pup prefers grass for her bathroom romps, and with water being such an expensive commodity, artificial was the way to go. Unfortunately, this grass tends to warm up quite a bit, and I worry about my dogâ€™s paws.
ShelterLogic developed a portable solution for this common problem: a doggy canopy! I had seen this around but never tried it out until now, and here is how it fared as a solution to my dilemma.
About ShelterLogic
Founded in 1991, ShelterLogic is a brand that focuses on providing shelters for anything you need! From protecting your car and tools from the elements to shelters for farm animals and greenhouse plants, ShelterLogic has aimed to create affordable, efficient, and durable products. Throughout the companyâ€™s success, ShelterLogic has become a go-to option for anyone enjoying the outdoors. As of late, ShelterLogic has expanded to creating canopies and shady areas for dogs and other household pets!
ShelterLogic not only creates shelter for your beloved pets, but the company is also very big on social responsibility and philanthropy. ShelterLogic donates to local shelters and often raises money for causes they strongly believe in.
Dog Shade Canopy Overview
Check Price on ShelterLogic Here is an overview of the Blue Dog Shade and why it is one of the best options for a shady retreat for your pup.
Sizes Available The ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy is currently available in three different sizes:
2-foot width x 2.5-foot height x 2.5-foot length (this size is good for small breed dogs) 4-foot width x 4-foot height x 5-foot length (this size is excellent for medium to large-size dogs) 4-foot width x 3-foot height x 4-foot length (this size is suitable for medium-sized dogs). The shelter only comes in the flattering royal blue color.
Pricing and Shipping Price is based upon the size selected:
2ft x 2.5ft x 2.5ft = $55.99 4ft x 4ft x 5ft = $79.99 4ft x 3ft x 4ft = $59.99 ShelterLogic does accept the Affirm service, so you can break the price down into monthly payments if wanted. Shipping is free!
Build, Materials, and Design Each Blue Dog Shade Canopy size comes with the same items within the box: The frame, the cover, and a bag of auger anchors.
The frame is made of strong steel, with a 1-inch/2.5-centimeter diameter, and coated with a premium powder finish.
The cover is made of Polyester 600 Denier, which is fire-resistant, water-resistant, and has a UV-ray protective coating. Velcro lining is what secures the cover to the frame.
The anchors are 15-inch auger anchors made of steel.
The ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy is outfitted with nylon foot plates that help keep the shelter securely in place without damaging anything! You can place this canopy on a deck and patio and be fine; there will be no issues with your wood.
Durability This is one of the most durable shelters due to the premium materials and thoughtfulness that went into designing the ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy!
To start, the powder coating on the steel frame is resistant to chipping, peeling, rust, and corrosionâ€”all of which tend to be problems with outdoor furniture since the canopy will be consistently exposed to the elements.
The blue cover is coated to resist UVB and UVA rays, so you wonâ€™t have any color bleaching or fading due to the sun. The Polyester 600 Denier material is resistant to fire and water, making the shelter unable to burn and fine in rain storms. The cover also canâ€™t be ripped.
The anchors are made of durable steel, so nothing will happen to them either!
Ease Of Construction and Use The ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy is designed to be very simple to build. The design is simply a frame, a canopy tarp, and some anchors.
The instructions are clear and assist with putting the frame together. Then, you pull the cover over and secure it with the velcro. Anchors can then be added to keep the frame from moving around. No screws are required except when doing the feet, everything else is like putting a Lego together â€“ super simple.
Warranty The ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy comes with a one-year warranty. Considering that the canopy is intended for everyday use (as a permanent fixture in your yard), I feel like the company confidently stands by its product.
You can submit a warranty claim directly on the ShelterLogic website by completing the warranty form.
In Summary Pros Three different sizes Fire-resistant, water-resistant UVB, & UVA ray-resistant Rust, corrosion, chipping, peeling resistant frame Nylon foot plates Anchors included Easy assembly Affordable One-year warranty Cons Velcro can detach with wind
Key Features
Check Price on ShelterLogic Easy Construction Iâ€™m not a handy person, but I was able to put this together. Itâ€™s much simpler than Ikea furniture!
Durability Being water-proof, fire-proof, UV-ray resistant, unable to corrode and rust, and coated to prevent chipping and peeling, I would say that this is probably one of the most durable canopies for your pet out there.
Nylon Foot Plates WIth Steel Anchors The nylon foot plates allow you to use the ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy on decks and patios without worrying about destroying the wood. The steel anchors help secure the canopy when placed on dirt, ground, sand, or grass.
Keeps Your Pets Cool And Safe From The Elements Using a canopy for your dogs is beneficial in many ways: your pup can have a nice shady spot to rest outside, escape from the rain , and keep the ground cool if you need a safe potty area in hot climates.
Is the ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy a Good Value? I will be honest with you, my jaw dropped to the floor when I saw the price of the ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy. Ranging in price from only $55.99 to $79.99, this is the most affordable high-quality canopy I have ever personally seen. Considering the build materials and durability of the ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy, I honestly cannot believe that is all it costs.
You can go to a different store and buy your pup a $25 tent or canopy, but I can promise that it will get destroyed quickly when left outside daily. Youâ€™ll be running to buy another one a quickly as you bought the first one. The ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy is intended for long-term use and will withstand much abuse. A one-time fee of $55.99 (with free shipping even!) on something that I can leave in my yard endlessly is an incredible value, not just a good one.
Check Price on ShelterLogic
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Is the ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy only intended for dogs? Although dogs tend to be significant users of shades like this, the canopy is not only for pups. Rabbits, cats, and other household pets can also benefit.
Is the ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy portable and easy to transport? Can I use it on road trips? Yes! This canopy is easy to disassemble and is small enough to be portable for beach trips , camping trips, and other adventures.
Can you get a replacement part if you lose a part or something happens? ShelterLogic offers replacement parts for any component that may be missing or damagedâ€”just call the company at 1-800-932-9344 for assistance.
Our Experience With the ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy As I mentioned in my intro, my dog Lorelei and I are residents of Southern California, where temperatures hit the hundreds in the summer. Unlike other states, our temperatures donâ€™t go down most of the year, so itâ€™s toasty likeâ€¦ 9 months out of the year. My entire front and back yards are artificial grass, which heats up quite a bit. I was very excited to get the ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy as a way to have a nice, cool, shady spot for my dog. I opted for the 4-foot width x 3-foot height x 4-foot length size as that would be perfect for my pup.
Assembly is required, but I found it pretty simple, even as someone who is not savvy about building things. The instructions are clear, and all parts are well-marked â€“ I wasnâ€™t confused about what is what. Admittedly I am a bit traumatized from Ikea furniture and expect everything to be like that, and this certainly was not â€“ it was so easy! I did find that pulling the canopy over was a bit more difficult for me. I am not a very strong person, and that is very taut and tight. But, it was well worth the endeavor, and I can always ask for my spouseâ€™s help if need be.
Even in the bright, beating sun, the area underneath the canopy remained very pleasant! I kept moving it around between days when I didnâ€™t have time to sit in the yard with my dog because of work (in which case, the shade was just to keep a potty area at a walkable temperature) and as a resting spot when we had time to spend outside. This size provided 8 square feet of shade coverage for my dog.
There was an unusual day in which the wind kicked up full force, and I wondered what would happen to my canopy! The anchors held it in place strong, so the frame itself didnâ€™t move anywhere. A few velcro spots started coming a bit undone with strong gusts, but not enough to pull the actual canopy fabric off â€“ it was a quick fix. I felt like the ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy is really durable and sturdy, and I donâ€™t think it would ever fall on my pup (I have complete confidence)!
Lorelei enjoys it, and as long as she spends time underneath there, itâ€™s a 10/10 in my book!
Check Price on ShelterLogic
Conclusion In finality, I should have gotten the ShelterLogic Blue Dog Shade Canopy a lot sooner than I did â€“ it has really fixed many issues with living in such a sun-beating hot environment ! My dog has a cool spot to do her business, and I donâ€™t have to worry about her paws as much.
The fact that the canopy can be so easily moved is also fantastic, both for when I clean the area and when I need the canopy to just be a chill, shady spot for her to get some fresh air and relax!

author: RedacciÃ³n Judicial
title: Alias â€˜Arencaâ€™ condenado por el secuestro de los padres del futbolista Luis DÃ­az | Noticias de hoy | EL ESPECTADOR
text: En un fallo emitido por un juez penal de San Juan del Cesar (La Guajira), Yerdinson BolÃ­var BolÃ­var, conocido como alias â€˜Arencaâ€™, fue condenado a una pena de cuatro aÃ±os y ocho meses de prisiÃ³n por su participaciÃ³n en el secuestro de Luis Manuel DÃ­az y Cilenis Marulanda, padres del futbolista Luis Fernando DÃ­az. El secuestro ocurriÃ³ el 28 de octubre de 2023 en Barrancas (La Guajira), cuando la pareja fue retenida en contra de su voluntad por un grupo armado, en un hecho que conmocionÃ³ al paÃ­s. Alias â€˜Arencaâ€™, tras aceptar los cargos por secuestro simple presentados por la FiscalÃ­a, tambiÃ©n fue sentenciado, aparte de la pena de prisiÃ³n, al pago de una multa equivalente a 234 salarios mÃ­nimos legales mensuales vigentes. AdemÃ¡s, se le impuso una inhabilitaciÃ³n para el ejercicio de funciones pÃºblicas durante 56 meses. Las investigaciones revelaron que â€˜Arencaâ€™, quien trabajaba como entrenador en la escuela de fÃºtbol del padre de Luis DÃ­az, utilizÃ³ su cercanÃ­a con la familia DÃ­az Marulanda para planificar el secuestro. SegÃºn la FiscalÃ­a, en varias oportunidades, se reuniÃ³ con miembros del EjÃ©rcito de LiberaciÃ³n Nacional (ELN) y les proporcionÃ³ detalles sobre las rutinas y movimientos de las vÃ­ctimas, lo que facilitÃ³ la operaciÃ³n del grupo armado. El dÃ­a del secuestro, alias â€˜Arencaâ€™ acompaÃ±Ã³ a la pareja a un puesto de frutas en Barrancas, donde los esperaban hombres armados que los retuvieron contra su voluntad. Cilenis Marulanda fue liberada pocas horas despuÃ©s del secuestro, mientras que Luis Manuel DÃ­az permaneciÃ³ en cautiverio durante 12 dÃ­as antes de ser finalmente liberado. En la audiencia de individualizaciÃ³n de la pena, alias â€˜Arencaâ€™ pidiÃ³ disculpas pÃºblicas a los padres del futbolista por su participaciÃ³n en los hechos. Asimismo, su colaboraciÃ³n con las autoridades y la aceptaciÃ³n de los cargos fueron factores clave para la reducciÃ³n de su condena. Las autoridades continÃºan investigando la vinculaciÃ³n de otros actores en el secuestro de los padres de Luis Fernando DÃ­az, mientras que se refuerzan las medidas de seguridad en la zona para prevenir la repeticiÃ³n de situaciones similares. Para conocer mÃ¡s sobre justicia, seguridad y derechos humanos, visite la secciÃ³n Judicial de El Espectador.

author: Ap Correspondent
title: 31 workers rescued after huge tunnel collapses in Los Angeles
text:
31 workers rescued after huge tunnel collapses in Los Angeles
A portion of a huge industrial tunnel under construction in Los Angeles collapsed Wednesday
Ap Correspondent
Thirty-one workers have been safely removed from an industrial tunnel under construction in Los Angeles after part of it collapsed on Wednesday, the Los Angeles Fire Department said.
The collapse occurred 5 to 6 miles (8 to 9.7km) from the tunnel's sole entrance in an industrial section of the city. Aerial footage from local television showed workers being lifted up through the tunnel's entrance.
Some workers on the other side of the collapsed portion of the tunnel scrambled over a 12 to 15ft-tall (19.3 to 24.1m-tall) mound of loose soil and reached several coworkers on the other side.
The workers were then shuttled several at a time by tunnel vehicle to the opening.
Paramedics were evaluating 27 of the workers removed from the tunnel.
The tunnel is under construction to eventually carry wastewater. It's 18ft (5.5m) wide, LAFD said. More than 100 LAFD workers were assigned to the scene, including those who specialize in rescues from confined spaces.
"LAFD has just reported that all workers who were trapped in the tunnel in Wilmington are now out and accounted for. I just spoke with many of the workers who were trapped. Thank you to all of our brave first responders who acted immediately," Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass said in a post on X.
topics: Disaster and Accident->industrial accident and incident
